aspguidp.helper

Class TemplateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.helper.TemplateHelper

  • public class TemplateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which provides static methods for the handling of representation templates.

    Representation templates are used to map an entity to another representation (for example: map an entity of the type 'edge' with the attributes 'from' and 'to' to the string atom representation edge(from,to)). The respective template for this conversion would be 'edge(::from,::to)'.

    Representation templates are stored in the application as sequences of instances of the class TemplatePart.

      • getTemplateParts

        public static java.util.List<TemplatePart> getTemplateParts(java.lang.String templateString,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> placeholderNameSupplier,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> placeholderValueSourceSupplier)
        Extract template parts from the given string representation of a template. Properties of placeholder template parts are gathered from the given supplier functions.
        Parameters:
        templateString - string representation of the template
        placeholderNameSupplier - function which supplies the name for a given placeholder id
        placeholderValueSourceSupplier - function which supplies the value source for a given placeholder id
        Returns:
        list of template part instances for the given string representation of a template

      • getMatchingTemplateParts

        public static java.util.List<TemplatePart> getMatchingTemplateParts(java.lang.String s,
                                                                    java.util.List<TemplatePart> templateParts)
        Try to match the given string against the given template parts. The returned list contains the maximum sub sequence of the given template parts, which can be matched against the given string. The returned sequence will always start with the first template part of the given template parts.
        Parameters:
        s - sequence which is matched against the given template parts
        templateParts - template parts which are matched against the given string
        Returns:
        maximum sequence of given template parts which matches against the given string

      • getMatchEndPosition

        public static java.lang.Integer getMatchEndPosition(java.lang.String s,
                                                    java.util.List<TemplatePart> templateParts)
        Returns the position of the end of the match, when the given string is matched against the given sequence of template parts.
        Parameters:
        s - string which is matched against the sequence of template parts
        templateParts - sequence of template parts which is matched against the given string
        Returns:
        end position of the match

      • getPattern

        public static java.lang.String getPattern(java.util.List<TemplatePart> templateParts)
        Returns the respective regex pattern for a sequence of template parts.
        Parameters:
        templateParts - sequence of template parts
        Returns:
        regex pattern respective to the given sequence of template parts
